item.title: Swap places
item.description: Sometimes we want to exchange tokens between them, and many times the easiest way is to use a Swap page. Those pages connect to your wallet, like Metamask, and ask for approval for interacting with your tokens. With those interactions will allow you to select the tokens to use as source (funds) and target from a list, or via their contract so that you can exchange them. Network URL BSC https://pancakeswap.
